row.process:
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_CONNECTION_ARGS : SET &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# = &UC4RB_SSH_CONNARGS#
!Command Timeout : SET &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SSH_ARGS#, " -sshtimeout &UC4RB_SSH_TIMEOUT#")
!We don't use sudo for windows system. : SET &UC4RB_SSH_WIN_ARGS# = &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS#
!SSH Options : IF &UC4RB_SSH_OPTIONS# <> "" ! Adding Allocate TTY in command : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_SSH_OPTIONS#,"Allocate TTY") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SSH_ARGS#, " -tty") : ENDIF ! We don't use sudo for windows system. : SET &UC4RB_SSH_WIN_ARGS# = &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# ! Adding Sudo in command if user is not root : IF &UC4RB_SSH_USERNAME# NE "root" : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_SSH_OPTIONS#,"Sudo") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_SSH_ARGS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SSH_ARGS#, " -sudo") : IF &UC4RB_SUDO_SSH_PASSWORD# NE "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_SUDO_SSH_PASSWORD#" ! Decrypt passphrase : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" $env:UC4_DECRYPTED_SUDO_PASS=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ELSE set UC4_DECRYPTED_SUDO_PASS=%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : ENDIF : ELSE export UC4_DECRYPTED_SUDO_PASS=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF
